I, <S%H4481><s%> even I <S%H4481><s%> Artaxerxes <S%H783><s%> the king, <S%H4430><s%> do make <S%H7761><s%> a decree <S%H2942><s%> to all <S%H3606><s%> the treasurers <S%H1490><s%> who are beyond <S%H5675><s%> the River, <S%H5103><s%> that whatever Ezra <S%H5831><s%> the priest, <S%H3549><s%> the scribe <S%H5613><s%> of the law <S%H1882><s%> of the God <S%H426><s%> of heaven, <S%H8065><s%> shall require <S%H7593><s%> of you, <S%H5648><s%> it be done with all diligence, <S%H629><s%>
